system.description: Fierce and brazen, these mages are always at war. The arms dealers of the world, their magic is completely focused on destruction and thus they seek to create bigger and better ways to blow things up. Passionate, wild and a bit chaotic, these mages like the mountains and underground spaces. If you are playing a Flame Mage be hot tempered, war-like, ready for battle, and consuming everything.

results.hit: Deal [[/damage 1d10[fire magic]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.
results.critHit: Double the @L[Core:Damage]{damage dice} dealt by this @L[Category:Abilities]{ability}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d10[fire magic]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.

results.hit: Deal [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.
results.critHit: Double the @L[Core:Damage]{damage dice} dealt by this @L[Category:Abilities]{ability}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d6[magic fire]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.

overview.base: The next @L[Category:Conjured spells]{conjured} @L[Category:Missile delivery spells]{missile spell} cast on the target @L[Core:Detonate Expansion]{detonates} (emanates in a 10 foot radius @L[Category:Aura delivery abilities]{aura} from the target). This is a @L[Core:MOV]{MOV} @L[Core:Feat Interaction]{feat save} using your DC. Do not add your @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{proficiency bonus} to the DC. This detonating @L[Category:Aura delivery abilities]{aura} is @L[Category:Loud effects]{loud}.
overview.proficient: Your @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{proficiency bonus} is now included in the @L[Core:Feat Interaction]{feat save DC}.
overview.fluent: Your @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluency bonus} is now included in the @L[Core:Feat Interaction]{feat save DC}.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, you may target an additional person.
system.requirements: Unless @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{proficient}, you may only target yourself.

overview.base: The area is illuminated. This light emanates from your hand and moves with you. You may change its direction at will.

Target is set @L[Property:On Fire]{on fire} or put out. Your hand counts as a torch for the purpose of this @L[Category:Spells]{spell}. When @L[Property:On Fire]{on fire}, your hand produces no smoke and being set @L[Property:On Fire]{on fire} does not harm it.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, the duration of this effect increases by 1 hour. The overall duration is rounded to the nearest hour.
